message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $220. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $220 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $220 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $180. I'm confident you won't find a better offer for this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $180 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
